Thank you for releasing new version updates for SharpNEAT. I can see new co=
mmits mentioning performance boost and improvement.=C2=A0=C2=A0Parallel com=
puting is needed the most in domains of reinforcement learning and especial=
ly where algorithm like NEAT stands over the top of others. I was wondering=
 if we could see new release that would use GPU for more performance boost.=

For C# it seemsAlea GPU=C2=A0will do the job. The library does use licence=
 for Enterprise level GPU like NVDIA Tesla and Grid but its free for consum=
er level with GeForce and Quadro (more on licencing=C2=A0here)
  
|  
|   |=
  
Alea GPU
 By QuantAlea Alea GPU Tutorial and Manual  |  |

  |

 

Once =
again, thanks Colin for new updates.
 

    On Sunday, 30 April 2017 2:13 A=
M, "Colin Green colin.green1@... [neat]" <neat@yahoogroups.com> wrote=
:
 

 =C2=A0   New release. Details here:

http://sharpneat.sourceforge.net=
/releases/sharpneat-release-2-3-0.html
 https://github.com/colgreen/sharpne=
at/releases/tag/v2.3.0

Colin
